00038 //implements helicalMotion
00039 helicalMotion::helicalMotion(std::string canonL, machineStatus prevStatus): canonMotion(canonL,prevStatus) {
00040   //part of processCanonLine
00041   //} else if (canon_line.startsWith( "ARC_FEED(" )) {
00042  gp_Dir arcDir;
00043  gp_Pnt c;
00044  double x,y,z,a1,a2,e1,e2,e3,ea,eb,ec,hdist;
00045  int rot=0;
00046  x=y=z=a1=a2=e1=e2=e3=ea=eb=ec=0;
00047  
00048  //edge.start = last;
00049  /* example output, starting from x0 y-1 z0 a0 b0 c0, command g02x1y0i0j1
00050  (names interleaved, see emc's saicanon.cc, line 497)
00051  8  N..... ARC_FEED(1.000000, 0.000000,    0.000000, 0.000000, 
00052  line Gline ARC_FEED(first_end, second_end, first_axis, second_axis,
00053  -1,        0.000000,   0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000)
00054  rotation, axis_end_point,   a,        b,        c)
00055  */
00056  e1  = tok2d(3); //first_end
00057  e2  = tok2d(4); //second_end
00058  a1 = tok2d(5); //first_axis
00059  a2 = tok2d(6); //second_axis
00060  rot = tok2d(7); //rotation (ccw if rot==1,cw if rot==-1)
00061  e3 = tok2d(8); //axis_end_point
00062  ea = tok2d(9); //a
00063  eb = tok2d(10); //b
00064  ec = tok2d(11); //c
00065  switch (status.getPlane()) {
00066    /* 
00067    ** the order for these vars is copied from saicannon.cc, line 509+ 
00068    ** a,b,c are untouched - yay! 
00069    */
00070    case CANON_PLANE_XZ:
00071      status.setEndPose(gp_Pnt(e2,e3,e1)); 
00072      arcDir = gp_Dir(0,1,0);
00073      c = gp_Pnt(a2,status.getStartPose().Location().Y(),a1);
00074      hdist = e3 - status.getStartPose().Location().Y();
00075      break;
00076    case CANON_PLANE_YZ:
00077      status.setEndPose(gp_Pnt(e3,e1,e2));
00078      arcDir = gp_Dir(1,0,0);
00079      c = gp_Pnt(status.getStartPose().Location().X(),a1,a2);
00080      hdist = e3 - status.getStartPose().Location().X();
00081      break;
00082    case CANON_PLANE_XY:
00083    default:
00084      status.setEndPose(gp_Pnt(e1,e2,e3));
00085      arcDir = gp_Dir(0,0,1);
00086      c = gp_Pnt(a1,a2,status.getStartPose().Location().Z());
00087      hdist = e3 - status.getStartPose().Location().Z();
00088  }
00089  //skip arc if zero length; caught this bug thanks to tort.ngc
00090  if (status.getStartPose().Location().Distance(status.getEndPose().Location()) > Precision::Confusion()) {
00091    //center is c; ends are edge.start, edge.last
00092    if (fabs(hdist) > 0.000001) {
00093      helix(status.getStartPose().Location(), status.getEndPose().Location(), c, arcDir,rot);
00094    } else {
00095      gp_Vec Vr = gp_Vec(c,status.getStartPose().Location());    //vector from center to start
00096      gp_Vec Va = gp_Vec(arcDir);                //vector along arc's axis
00097      gp_Vec startVec = Vr^Va;           //find perpendicular vector using cross product
00098      if (rot==1) startVec *= -1;
00099      //cout << "Arc with vector at start: " << toString(startVec).toStdString();
00100      arc(status.getStartPose().Location(), startVec, status.getEndPose().Location());
00101    }
00102    /*
00103    FIXME - rewrite or copy the old funcs into new src
00104    chkEdgeStruct check = checkEdge(feedEdges, feedEdges.size()-1);
00105    if (check.startGap != 0.0) {
00106      exit(-1); //what SHOULD we do here?!
00107    }
00108    if (check.endGap != 0.0) {
00109      last = check.realEnd;
00110      feedEdges.back().end = last;
00111      if (check.endGap > 100.0*Precision::Confusion()) {
00112        cout << " with center " << toString(c).toStdString();
00113        if (mtype == HELIX) cout << " and arcDir " << toString(arcDir).toStdString();
00114        cout << " from " << toString(status.getStartPose().Location()).toStdString() << " to " << toString(status.getEndPose).toStdString() << endl;
00115        cout << "params:  e1:"<< e1 <<"  e2:" << e2 <<"  a1:"<< a1 <<"  a2:"<< a2 <<"  rot:" << rot <<"  ep:" << ep << endl;
00116      }
00117    }
00118    */
00119  } else cout << "Skipped zero-length arc." << endl;
00120 }
00121 
00122 void helicalMotion::helix( gp_Pnt start, gp_Pnt end, gp_Pnt c, gp_Dir dir, int rot ) {
00123   Standard_Real pU,pV;
00124   Standard_Real radius = start.Distance(c);
00125   gp_Pnt2d p1,p2;
00126   Handle(Geom_CylindricalSurface) cyl = new Geom_CylindricalSurface(gp_Ax2(c,dir) , radius);
00127   GeomAPI_ProjectPointOnSurf proj;
00128   TopoDS_Edge h;
00129   int success = 0;
00130   
00131   h.Nullify();
00132   //cout << "Radius " << radius << "   Rot has the value " << rot << endl;
00133   proj.Init(start,cyl);
00134   if(proj.NbPoints() > 0) {
00135     proj.LowerDistanceParameters(pU, pV);
00136     if(proj.LowerDistance() > 1.0e-6 ) {
00137       //cout << "Point fitting distance " << double(proj.LowerDistance()) << endl;
00138     }
00139     success++;
00140     p1 = gp_Pnt2d(pU,pV);
00141   }
00142   
00143   proj.Init(end,cyl);
00144   if(proj.NbPoints() > 0) {
00145     proj.LowerDistanceParameters(pU, pV);
00146     if(proj.LowerDistance() > 1.0e-6 ) {
00147       //cout << "Point fitting distance " << double(proj.LowerDistance()) << endl;
00148     }
00149     success++;
00150     p2 = gp_Pnt2d(pU,pV);
00151   }
00152   
00153   if (success != 2) {
00154    /* FIXME
00155    cout << "Couldn't create a helix from " << toString(start).toStdString() << " to " << toString(end).toStdString() << ". Replacing with a line." <<endl;
00156    */
00157     errors=true;
00158     edge = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeEdge( start, end );
00159     return;
00160   }
00161   
00162   //for the 2d points, x axis is about the circumference.  Units are radians.
00163   //change direction if rot = 1, not if rot = -1
00164   //if (rot==1) p2.SetX((p1.X()-p2.X())-2*M_PI); << this is wrong!
00165   //cout << "p1x " << p1.X() << ", p2x " << p2.X() << endl;
00166   
00167   //switch direction if necessary, only works for simple cases
00168   //should always work for G02/G03 because they are less than 1 rotation
00169   if (rot==1) {
00170     p2.SetX(p2.X()-2*M_PI);
00171     //cout << "p2x now " << p2.X() << endl;
00172   }
00173   Handle(Geom2d_TrimmedCurve) segment = GCE2d_MakeSegment(p1 , p2);
00174   edge = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeEdge(segment , cyl);
00175   
00176   return;
00177 }
00178 
00179 void helicalMotion::arc(gp_Pnt start, gp_Vec startVec, gp_Pnt end) {
00180     Handle(Geom_TrimmedCurve) Tc;
00181     Tc = GC_MakeArcOfCircle ( start, startVec, end );
00182     edge = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeEdge ( Tc );
00183 }
